titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of March 2013 as "National Middle Level Education Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
3/19/2013--Introduced. Recognizes the importance of middle level education and the contributions of the individuals who educate middle level students.
Encourages people to observe National Middle Level Education Month by visiting and celebrating schools that are responsible for educating young adolescents in the United States.
